text: Lone Star Lake is a lake in southwestern Douglas County, in the U.S. state of Kansas.Douglas County - Lone Star Lake Fishing Information It is 185 acre (75 ha) big. The lake is southwest of the unincorporated community of Lone Star, Kansas. Lone Star Lake is in Lone Star Lake Park. It has camping, fishing, picnic shelters, and a swimming beach. The lake and park are owned and operated by Douglas County. ==References== Category:Lakes of Kansas Category:Bodies of water of Douglas County, Kansas
title: Lone Star Lake
